src:
Lolos ke PON, Tim Sepak Bola Porwil Bengkulu Berpeluang Sumbang Emas
02 Nov 2019, 17:16 by Roki EP


Lolos ke PON, Tim Sepak Bola Porwil Bengkulu Berpeluang Sumbang Emas

KBRN, Bengkulu : Tim sepak bola Porwil ke X Sumatera dari Provinsi Bengkulu, berpeluang menyumbangkan medali emas dalam perhelatan olahraga empat tahunan ini, meski sebelumnya juga dipastikan lolos PON di Papua tahun 2020 mendatang.
Peluang tersebut, setelah berhasil bermain imbang ketika menjamu Riau di Stadion Padang Panjang Kabupaten Bengkulu Selatan.
“Dengan hasil itu, Bengkulu menjadi juara group dengan poin 10, hasil tiga kali menang di Stadion Semarak Sawah Lebar, beberapa hari lalu,” ungkap Pelatih Kepala tim sepak bola Porwil Bengkulu Muswar Bakhtari, ketika dihubungi wartawan.
Muswar juga menyampaikan rasa syukur, meski pemain lapis kedua yang diberikan kesempatan tampil, namun berhasil meraih poin satu, dengan skor imbang 0-0 melawan Riau, kemarin.
Dengan menjadi juara group, anak asuhannya melaju ke final, dan Minggu sore besok akan melawan Aceh di Stadion Semarak Bengkulu.
“Target kita menang dan tim sepak bola Bengkulu menyumbangkan emas di Porwil ini,” katanya, Sabtu, (2/11/2019).
Sementara itu, pemerhati Sepak Bola Bengkulu Hakman Novi menyanjung atas keberhasilan tim sepak bola Bengkulu yang mampu bermain bagus dan masuk final, meski sebelumnya diluar dugaan. Bahkan tim sepak bola Bengkulu lolos ke PON.
“Saya mengajak semua masyarakat Bengkulu agar bersama-sama mendukung tim kesayangan ini bermain di Stadion Semarak Sawah Lebar pada sore ini, sehingga hasil sempurna medali emas bisa diraih,” tukasnya.
text:
Passing to PON, Bengkulu Regional Football Team Has a Gold Donation Chance
02 Nov 2019, 17:16 by Roki EP


Passing to PON, Bengkulu Regional Football Team Has a Gold Donation Chance

KBRN, Bengkulu: Porwil X soccer team from Sumatra Province from Bengkulu Province has the opportunity to donate a gold medal in this four-year sports event, although previously it was also certain to qualify for PON in Papua in 2020.
These opportunities, after successfully drawing a draw when entertaining Riau in Padang Panjang Stadium, South Bengkulu Regency.
"With that result, Bengkulu won the group with 10 points, the result of three wins at the Semarak Sawah Lebar Stadium, a few days ago," said Bengkulu Football Team Head Porwil Muswar Bakhtari, when contacted by reporters.
Muswar also expressed his gratitude, although the second-tier player who was given the opportunity to appear, but managed to win one point, with a 0-0 draw against Riau, yesterday.
By becoming the group champion, his foster children advance to the final, and Sunday afternoon tomorrow will be against Aceh at Bengkulu Semarak Stadium.
"Our target is to win and Bengkulu football team donates gold in this Regional Office," he said, Saturday (11/02/2019).
Meanwhile, Bengkulu Football observer Hakman Novi lauds the success of the Bengkulu soccer team who were able to play well and enter the final, even though it was previously unexpected. Even the Bengkulu soccer team qualified for PON.
"I invite all Bengkulu people to jointly support this favorite team playing at Semarak Sawah Lebar Stadium this afternoon, so that the perfect gold medal result can be won," he said.
